google_compute_security_policy.description: Creates a Security Policy resource for Google Compute Engine.

name.description: The name of the security policy.

description.description: An optional description of this rule. Max size is 64.

project.description: The project in which the resource belongs. If it

rule.description: The set of rules that belong to this policy. There must always be a default

action.description: Action to take when `match` matches the request. Valid values:

priority.description: An unique positive integer indicating the priority of evaluation for a rule.

match.description: A match condition that incoming traffic is evaluated against.

preview.description: When set to true, the `action` specified above is not enforced.

config.description: The configuration options available when specifying `versioned_expr`.

versioned_expr.description: Predefined rule expression. If this field is specified, `config` must also be specified.

expr.description: User defined CEVAL expression. A CEVAL expression is used to specify match criteria

src_ip_ranges.description: Set of IP addresses or ranges (IPV4 or IPV6

expression.description: Textual representation of an expression in Common Expression Language syntax.

self_link.description: The URI of the created resource.
